name: Rock Werchter

config_properties.name: Rock Werchter
config_properties.description: Belgium's largest annual rock music festival, held in Werchter since 1974, featuring major international artists.

ai_profile:
**Rock Werchter 2026: A Diverse and Eclectic Celebration of Music**  

Rock Werchter 2026 brings together 29 artists spanning a wide array of genres, with a strong emphasis on Indie Rock (6 artists) and Alternative Rock (5 artists). The lineup also features a balanced mix of Electronic, Pop, and Soul influences, alongside niche genres like Psychedelic Rock, Jazz Rap, and Ambient, showcasing the festival's commitment to musical diversity. With an average rating of 7.62 and 100% of artists rated and available on Spotify, this year’s lineup promises a high-quality experience for all attendees.  

In terms of geographical representation, the festival highlights a predominantly Western presence, with 12 acts hailing from the USA and 11 from the UK, while Belgium, Canada, Germany, and Australia also contribute to the mix. However, there is room for improvement in terms of cultural representation, as only 2 artists are confirmed as people of color. On the gender front, male artists dominate the lineup (22), with fewer female (3) and non-binary (1) performers, though two acts feature mixed-gender members.  

Rock Werchter 2026 continues to build on its reputation as a world-class festival, blending mainstream appeal with experimental sounds. The inclusion of DJs, virtual bands, and genre-bending acts reflects the event’s ongoing efforts to evolve and cater to diverse musical tastes. Fans can look forward to an exciting celebration of artistry and innovation.
